meanings.definition: Not based on or conforming to what is generally done or believed.
meanings.sent1: Her nonconventional approach to problem-solving impressed her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The artist's nonconventional style stood out in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The nonconventional idea of wearing pajamas to work made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His nonconventional thinking was like a breath of fresh air in the stuffy office.
meanings.sent5: The nonconventional solution sparked a wave of creativity among the team.

meanings.definition: Not following or conforming to tradition or accepted practices.
meanings.sent1: The nonconventional decision to have a picnic in the rain surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses nonconventional methods to decorate for the holidays.
meanings.sent3: Their nonconventional dance routine at the wedding was a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: The nonconventional recipe for chocolate cake included unexpected ingredients.
meanings.sent5: His nonconventional approach to teaching kept his students engaged and excited.

meanings.definition: Different from what is usual or traditional.
meanings.sent1: The nonconventional design of the building attracted attention from passersby.
meanings.sent2: In her nonconventional outfit, she felt confident and unique.
meanings.sent3: The nonconventional use of fruit in the salad added a fun twist to the meal.
meanings.sent4: His nonconventional choice of music for the event set a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The nonconventional color scheme of the room created a vibrant and modern look.
